mapper.select: SELECT count(id) as id, sum(meter_peoples) as meter_peoples, sum(meter_read_order) as meter_read_order, sum(meter_read_code) as meter_read_code, sum(meter_settle_code) as meter_settle_code, sum(meter_owe_amt) as meter_owe_amt, sum(meter_penalty_amt) as meter_penalty_amt, sum(meter_year_total_waters) as meter_year_total_waters, sum(meter_total_waters) as meter_total_waters, sum(meter_price_step_waters) as meter_price_step_waters FROM tenant_meter ${ew.customSqlSegment}
